build.buildCommand: bash -c 'ROOT=$(pwd); while [ ! -f "$ROOT/package.json" ] || ! grep -q \"workspaces\" "$ROOT/package.json" 2>/dev/null; do ROOT=$(dirname "$ROOT"); done; cd "$ROOT" && npm run build --workspace=@cloudpost/backend'

deploy.startCommand: bash -c 'ROOT=$(pwd); while [ ! -f "$ROOT/package.json" ] || ! grep -q \"workspaces\" "$ROOT/package.json" 2>/dev/null; do ROOT=$(dirname "$ROOT"); done; cd "$ROOT" && npm start --workspace=@cloudpost/backend'
